provider.attributionText: Disclaimer: Always check with the business for pricing and availability of menu items. SinglePlatform is not responsible for menu or pricing changes, but the information is believed to be accurate when posted. Listing of a menu does not mean that there is any affiliation, endorsement or sponsorship between SinglePlatform and the listed business.

items.name: Beers On Tap As of May 17, 2018
items.description: Draft beer list is subject to change. Size: Pint - $4.75 | Pitcher - $12.50 | Growler - $11 ($3 charge for new Growler Glass)

items.name: German Pilsner
items.description: Crisp - Crackery - Dry - (Color) pale straw (Aroma) spicy noble hops, cracker-like, clean (Flavor) crisp bitterness, bready malt, spicy hops (Food Pairing) light sandwiches, lightly fried food, mild pasta

items.name: Hefeweizen
items.description: Creamy - Mild - Wheaty - (Color) straw (Aroma) bready malt, wheat, subtle fruit (Flavor) creamy, bread crust, wheaties (Food Pairing) light salads, spicy dishes, shellfish

items.name: Amber Ale
items.description: Caramelly - Dark Bread - Hoppy - (Color) amber (Aroma) dank american hops, caramel malt, rich bread (Flavor) toasted dark bread, citrusy hops, caramel (Food Pairing) rich sandwiches, roasted chicken, creamy pasta

items.name: Bottled Beers As of May 17, 2018
items.description: 1 pint 0.9 oz.. Bottle

items.name: Fröhlich Pils
items.description: Crisp - Crackery - Dry - (ABV) 5.5% (Color) pale straw (Aroma) spicy noble hops, cracker-like, clean (Flavor) crisp bitterness, bready malt, spicy hops (Food Pairing) light sandwiches, lightly fried food, mild pasta

items.name: Golden Halo Blonde Ale
items.description: Mild - Bready - Smooth - (ABV) 5.8% (Color) light gold (Aroma) grassy noble hops, bready malt, subtle fruit (Flavor) honey, bread crust, hay, lemon (Food Pairing) lightly fried food, fruity salads, bready desserts

items.name: Grand Bavaria
items.description: Fruity - Wheaty - Creamy - (ABV) 5% (Color) gold (Aroma) clove, banana, bread dough, lemon zest (Flavor) creamy wheat, low baking spices, citrus, doughy (Food Pairing) spicy dishes, burgers, fruity desserts

items.name: Le Quatre Saison
items.description: Rustic - Tart - Fruity - (ABV) 6.2% (Color) light gold (Aroma) tangerine, bread dough, lemon zest, bubblegum (Flavor) tart, fresh citrus juice, clove, black pepper (Food Pairing) salmon dishes, light salads, mild pasta

items.name: Elephino Double Ipa
items.description: Hoppy - Citrusy - Resinous - (ABV) 8% (Color) light amber (Aroma) piney and floral hops, citrus zest, resin (Flavor) pine, grapefruit, caramel malt, grass (Food Pairing) rich salads, burgers, spiced desserts

items.name: 20Th Anniversary Imperial Red Ale
items.description: Bold - Caramely - Citrusy - (ABV) 9.5% (Color) deep copper (Aroma) citrus and floral hops, bread crust, molasses, caramel (Flavor) dark fruit, citrusy hops, toasted pumpernickel bread, roasted nuts (Food Pairing) roasted meats, bold pizzas, ice cream desserts

items.name: Bobcat Nut Brown Ale
items.description: Toasty - Nutty - Hoppy - (ABV) 6.1% (Color) chestnut brown (Aroma) dank american hops, molasses, caramel malt, multigrain bread (Flavor) earthy, toasted bread, biscuit, toffee, roasted nuts (Food Pairing) fried food, grilled meats, caramely desserts

items.name: Drioma Russian Imperial Stout
items.description: Roasty - Chocolaty - Smooth - (ABV) 10.1% (Color) very deep brown (Aroma) roasted malt, dark chocolate, coffee, licorice (Flavor) dark toasted bread, bittersweet chocolate, coffee & cream, brown sugar (Food Pairing) grilled steak or pork, rich sandwiches, ice cream desserts

items.name: Mtn West Ruby Hard Cider - 500 Ml
items.description: This is a locally made, traditional style cider. Taste is dry, off-sweet, with very subtle apple notes. 6.8% abv

items.name: La Marca Prosecco
items.description: Fresh and clean with ripe citrus, lemon, green apple and touches of grapefruit. A lengthy finish that is light, refreshing and crisp

items.name: Segura Viudas Aria Pinot Noir Brut
items.description: Made from 100% pinot noir. Slightly creamy, yet crisp with raspberry & strawberry aromas, and hints of cherry and watermelon

items.name: Kendal Jackson Chardonnay
items.description: Beautifully integrated tropical flavors with citrus notes that explode in your mouth. A hint of toasted oak and butter rounds out the long, lingering finish

items.name: Torre Di Luna Pinot Grigio
items.description: Dry and crisp, delicate floral and pear aromas. Well rounded, with hints of minerality in a satisfying finish

items.name: Allegro Moscato
items.description: Sweet, lightly sparkling, flavors of orange blossoms and ripe peach. Made from the Muscat Canelli grape, which gives this bouquet of floral and honeyed fruits a crisp and tantalizing finish

items.name: Mohua Sauvignon Blanc
items.description: Exhibits lifted aromatics, of lime and citrus zest, melon, and lemongrass. The palate has pure intense flavors of passion fruit and white peach, ripe lemon and fresh herb

items.name: Saracina Chardonnay California
items.description: A fresh and lively no-oak style with crisp clean flavors and a lengthy finish

items.name: Wild Thing Rendezvous Rose
items.description: Dark pink drink with loads of rich red fruit and a dry snappy finish

items.name: Conundrum White
items.description: Spicy rich and full bodied with tropical flavors, ripe citrus notes and accents of french oak

items.name: Red Wines
items.description: We have a great selection right now, come in and check it out

items.name: Kenwood Pinot Noir, Sonoma
items.description: Fruity aromas of strawberries and raspberries followed by subtle aromas of rose petals and herbs; viscous texture and supple tannins give way to a long, smooth finish

items.name: Cono Sur Organic Cabarnet
items.description: Organic red blend with aromas of red plums and strawberries with hints of black fruits, toasted oak and smooth tannins

items.name: Trapiche Oak Cask Malbec
items.description: Velvety and smooth, with flavors of blackberries, plum, and a smoky, vanilla finish

items.name: Fattoria Del Cerro Chianti Colli Sensi Docg
items.description: Eccentric and fragrant, with wild black cherry aromas and hints of a balsamic and herbal finish

items.name: Apothic Red
items.description: A blend of primarily Zinfandel, Syrah, Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon. These varieties come together seamlessly for a fruit driven wine with fresh dark fruit flavors and jammy red fruit notes

items.name: Louis M. Martini Cabernet
items.description: Flavors of black plum jam and ripe loganberries. Hints of oak and a touch of Christmas spice support the fruit

items.name: Conundrum Red
items.description: Spicy rich and loaded with ripe jammy black fruit, pepper, smoke and spice

items.name: Bucklin Bambino Zinfandel
items.description: Fragrant and aromatic, shows loads of fresh black fruit with a long spicy finish
